/Ghost.content:
# About
Bordered by a ravine. 

Wolfkin and Mousekin claim the country was the invaded by something. The undead?  A vengeful paladin? But the Wolfkin are fighting to get the country back 

Incredibly Dark

North - Ratkin
Bathumhold - Vampires

/Items/Dominus-Oraculum.title: Dominus Oraculum
/Items/Dominus-Oraculum.content:
Book made out of human flesh found by [Naberus](People/Players/Ex-Players/Naberus.md)

1.  One shall come and 3 shall hide and all dwarves shall kneel when she does arise. DONE
    
2.  Beware the fox of pure intention, you will be betrayed. Though he knows not the darkness his actions serve. DONE
    
3. The wolf shall return and with him rip the realm atwain. Two must become one or else one shall become two. DONE
    
4. Invest in better footwear.
    
5.  The smallest one to lose their way may be saved by the ones they have lost.
    
6.  Take the right wing door. DONE
    
7.  The gods do not trouble themselves with the frivolities of men.
    
8.  Thirsty are the axes of red, black and blue and the thirst will claim.
    
9.  Hedgehogs will steal your staff from your staff.
    
10.  On Marpenoth 20, 1381 at 13:04:25, duck. DONE
    
11. Don‚Äôt let Qidan pluck the pink one.
    
12.  Four shall ride and three shall ride the sky as two, and one shall ride in flames; and there shall be no stopping them.

/Myts.title: Untitled Page
/Myts.content:
## About
- Technological City.
- High poverty line contains slums.
- Large Lenses and cool locomotive carriage 

# Leadership
[Minister Rabaniar](People/NPC/Minister%20Rabaniar.md) the new leader of the Ministry of Information

## Locations
- Gnomehaven - Where the Gnomes lives
- Slums - Breeze is there
- Noble Quarter
	- Wonder Garden?
- Ministry of Information

### Tarverns
- Lemmingmere Plaza - There is something up with the inn keeper but we are too blind to notice anything.
- The Whip in Hand - Run by Charity of [The Joy Family](Organisations/The%20Joy%20Family.md), she makes a great breakfast.

## Events
- Find [Breeze](People/NPC/Breeze.md) and their sister  provide them with healing. BULLSHIT

## Remaining Questions
What was happening to the buildings in Myts?

/People/NPC/Fang.title: Untitled Page
/People/NPC/Fang.content:
(8) Teenage fang has got a massive WANG (8)

## About
Little Wolf kin / Fully grown wolfkin due to a time crystal and branching paths.

## Events
- Last seen by the party when he travelled back in time to see his father. He then broke the one rule that he stayed behind and basically broke the whole of Space and Time.  But that wont come back to bite us...
- There are now two Fangs, Old Fang who went back in time and a Fang which decided not to go back in time.
- Gone to fight [The Marquis](People/NPC/The%20Marquis.md) in Ghost
- The Mergening - Leading to little fang body with teenage fang consciousness

/People/NPC/Pibbles.title: Untitled Page
/People/NPC/Pibbles.content:
## About
Fey Creature - Adorable

## Appearance
Hedgehog-kin in a suit and usually in a position requiring the parties help

## Events
- Feyrealm an escort mission with a group of hedgehogs to a local village and defended them against some blink dogs. The party then gave Pibbles alot of gold and suggested him to the local Authority that a life of politics may suit him. For which he ditched his counterparts (It's ok they robbed the party after in the Hedgeshot)
- Water realm, Pibbles is now the advisor to a Fayreleam's diplomat, who under the control of a mind flayer murders them with cold blood. Only the party and Pibbles know this.

/People/Players/Qidan.title: Untitled Page
/People/Players/Qidan.content:
# About
Class - Spore Druid
From - [Ofheise](Ofheise.md)

## Backstory:
Part of a drudic clan which resided in the forests northwest of [Ofheise](Ofheise.md) was cast out for being lazy and focused on the darker parts of druidic craft focusing on spores and decay instead of life and rejuvenation. Qidan was cast out at 14 left as a Lonely teenage firbolg outside the city of the elves. Qidan was picked up/hoodwinked by Saraki and used to dispose of bodies of failed rituals for [Lolth](People/Gods/Lolth.md). Imagine like Cousin Lumpy.

### Recent Developments
After heading to the [Thyme Wastes](Thyme%20Wastes.md) with the party to investigate [Madame Porkus](People/NPC/Madame%20Porkus.md), we discovered notes. About me, that i was tested on by [The Syndicate](Organisations/The%20Syndicate.md), I have no recollection of this but could explain how I popped into existence with the party. I always thought I lived in Ofhiese and never left. I need answers if I can't get it from this Oinker is either going to squeal or I am gonna have to find some of the other subject users from these files.

#### The files
{could do with a write up of the notes.}
##### Qidan -  Subject 131

#### Subject 176
- Male Firbolg
- Ophise
- Mute and unresponsive
- reculsive 
- Missing, yet to be treated

## Rave 1 v 1 (Daria Vs Romanof)
- Daria fucking owned Romanof
	- She is so broken...
- Romanof says he will clear the West side of the wall at Sunset

## Melon Orgy
- The poet is melon inspired from the melon orgy and is writting sonnets and odes to melon.


## The Attack on Minster Rabniar's House
The Attack to escape Myts happened two fold. 
[Winter Daira and Qidan](#Winter%20Daira%20and%20Qidan)
[Archi](#Archi)

### Winter, Daira and Qidan
At the west side of the wall, all use disguse self to turn into a trio of maids:
- DANIESE 
- Lutrice 
- Lulubell

- We did incredible persuastion nothing more
- We get upstairs and meet blossom
	- Blossom didnt do well with our advances

### Archi
After laying low with a member from the Ministry of Information he discovers his Manager is dead. Travels to find out more about the [Minister Rabaniar](People/NPC/Minister%20Rabaniar.md)
He arrives at the east side of the wall:
- Parkours over the wall
	- Ballsy moment also known as a Romanof
	- Jumps off a thatch roof and lands like a little ninja
	- Climbs a balcony while Winter Daria and Qidan are in the dining room
		- Daria does not see
	- Hides from a painter(Blossom and invesigates the room)
	- Eventually hears conversation next door and is spotted by Qidan who throws a mushroom to prove it is himself.

### The whole party
- Archi spends time looking over Blossoms art
	- buildings are missing over time
	- Qidan remembers construction workers talking about removing buildings
		- "The field is dangerous"
- ESCAPE PLAN TIME
	- Acid support beams of the antimagic tower
	- Archi tries to accost the minister
		- We escape with notes and a penguin
			- Draft proposals for Mytz 
				- Disbanding and focusing on religon they seem to counter each other
			- Midnight(Common) midnight (Absall) was written on one of the plans
				- The lady of long night.
				- I assume the Syndicate still remains in Mytz
				- Is it Minister Rabnair or Minister SSSSS(I dont remember the name)

## Outside of Mytz
- Tried to heal blossom,  "lady xaio said I was ill"
	- She had a cold, i used greater restoration on a cold.
	- I gave blossom her paint. I wont be writing about her any more.... <sub><sup>*grumbles*</sup></sub>
- We plan for Thyme Waste so that we can return to Mytz later
- I travel as a vulture and we meet the [Pussy Bandits](Organisations/Pussy%20Bandits.md) and stay with them for the evening.

- Winter dreams:
	- Notes on the table of the ritual
		- A map of the Thyme wastes with a X on it (will be updated on the map check next session)

- Daria dreams:
	- A woman made of red
	- "You know who I am but I know what you have done"
	- She melts into a boy. The Orphan who died in the bag of holding.
	- She feels the weight of the axe
	- The person in front of Daria is Malice
		- Bitch be tripping
	- "You should do it again"
	- Daria is too wise to be a murderer yet.

/Sessions/Session-11.content:
# Session 11

## Waking up in the desert
- RING RING its you Motorola Sending Stone
	- Breeze and other have arrived and will be made to work for there keep
	- Myts first regiment has been mobilised for Archi
		- Plots many ways to kill them
			- Using our Vampire and Werewolf army
			- Taking over the prison and trap them
			- Avoiding them all
		- We still need to talk about this
 
 ## Talking about hopes lament
- Rumour of the woman in black arriving at the prison and taking over in a blink of a eye.
- Chatting to [Brior](People/NPC/Brior.md) - He is mute
	- Turned him into the camel and spoke with animals
	- [Madame Porkus](People/NPC/Madame%20Porkus.md) 
		- Brior fled from her
		- The woman in black, I didn't make that connection (LOL)
		- Told by the warden to give her everything she needed 
		- She wanted to speak to the inmates
		- She commandeered a whole wing but she hasn't come out again
	- Why did Brior leave?
		- Sometimes she would request prisoners to the wing there would be noises (terrible noises)
	- The Warden?
		- He is a good man
		- Dwarf
		- Maybe we should get on his good side (see later for how we didn't)
	- Who are the inmates? He didn't know
- We get attacked by a purple worm
	- We kill it. 
## Travel to The Last Pint

- rest of the party goes in the tavern
- Matrimony Bartender of the Bar
	- Member of the Joy Family 
	- Like Charity
- Daria gets propositioned by a guard of the Hopes Lament as they want to take her to funky town. 
- Meet a wears dealer of shoes, INVEST IN BOOTS [Dominus Oraculum](Items/Dominus%20Oraculum.md) I think...
	- It didn't work 
	- but I then gave him money to be a Investor it is gonna make me a millionaire
			- Or my contract could kill him but I am a good guy...
	- The Pussy Bandits (apart from Brior) leave 
		- City of Cine in the [Indel](Indel.md)
			- Meet the [Pussy Bandits](Organisations/Pussy%20Bandits.md) in the Come on in.

## Arrive at Hopes Lament
- In summation Daria goes HAHA alot because we as a group are pretending to be members of the synidcate
- Am a vulture honestly it is so fun to fly that i didn't really pay attention to what was going on but I noted that they were entering the prison so I flew down and turned into me and Brior into a Rat.
- Arrive at the Warden's Office he seems really nice and everyone acts like a dick because we are evil and I am a rat


Out of Character

/Sessions/Session-12.title: Session 12
/Sessions/Session-12.content:
# Session 12
## In the Warden's Office and on to PorkyPorcus
We have been there for a while, I remained as a rat while the other members of the party tried to be all big boss scary. We then leave the office a guard greets us:
- There has been a fight in ward 9
	- Guards are going to fight to subdue the incident
As we are walking through the wings dont make sense as:
- 4 wings but the prison should fit 3
- Turns out all prison wings are in pocket dimensions. 

## Entering Porcus' Wing
- We entered the cells and found all mind control creatures tortured and killed.
	- Some mind control shit is coming I can smell it.
- Head up to solitary confinement.
	- Box, covered in chains, a very tempting box. God damn we should have opened that box but Daira tried and she was freaked, I havent seen her like that since returning home from her first evening with her Dragon counterpart.

## Research and Development
Oh no it is a puzzle. A very painful puzzle. 

### Obtained loot:
- Books on Squirells
- Anklet with acorns on

### Back story/ LORE DUMP (loved it):
- [Qidan Backstory](People/Players/Qidan.md#Recent%20Developments) 
	- Should try and find a Male Firbolg in Ophise and a Locodon Taxidermist in The Lepus(?)
- Daria
	- Hungering Gloom - with the word (IRA) on it
- Vampiric sea creatures (The seal from before)
- A sect of werewolf hoar worshipers
- [The Syndicate](Organisations/The%20Syndicate.md)sent the horrible creatures to [Elunore](Elunore.md) which the previous members of the party plus Daria killed.

### Events
- Archi has a Shakespeare moment with [Morie Destroyer of Worlds](People/NPC/Morie%20Destroyer%20of%20Worlds.md)
	-  Ask him about the wars
		- He lies, as he always does. You think for a guy who is just a head in a bag of holding he would like the company.
		- Note for Daria, Clean the bag of holding we haven't done that for a while.
- "Idea Dumpnut..." - I dont know why I wrote this down but i liked it so it can stay
- Coloured Dragon's are evil and Daria was cancelled 

### Quest Related Tasks

 - [Octopus Tattoo (Cathuwu)](Organisations/Octopus%20Tattoo%20(Cathuwu).md) (interitus?)
	 - Still cant find "adflictium(?)"
 - We need to talk to Naberus about working for [The Syndicate](Organisations/The%20Syndicate.md) in making Automatons for them.
 - Research Largos when we can, as one was spotted in [Shrash](Shrash)
 - Zero gravity anomaly in the plane of water causing a lot of deaths. 
	 - Has this already happened? Or should we check in with the old Pirate Captain woman?

## Time to make some piggy squeal
We start a battle against [Madame Porkus](People/NPC/Madame%20Porkus.md).

/notes/custom-Domain.title: Custom Domain
/notes/custom-Domain.content:
### Registrar
This step is only applicable if you are using a **custom domain**! If you are using a `<YOUR-USERNAME>.github.io` domain, you can skip this step.

For this last bit to take effect, you also need to create a CNAME record with the DNS provider you register your domain with (i.e. NameCheap, Google Domains).

GitHub has some [documentation on this](https://docs.github.com/en/pages/configuring-a-custom-domain-for-your-github-pages-site/managing-a-custom-domain-for-your-github-pages-site), but the tldr; is to

1. Go to your forked repository (`github.com/<YOUR-GITHUB-USERNAME>/quartz`) settings page and go to the Pages tab. Under "Custom domain", type your custom domain, then click **Save**.
2. Go to your DNS Provider and create a CNAME record that points from your domain to `<YOUR-GITHUB-USERNAME.github.io.` (yes, with the trailing period).

	![Example Configuration for Quartz](/notes/images/google-domains.png)*Example Configuration for Quartz*
3. Wait 30 minutes to an hour for the network changes to kick in.
4. Done!

/notes/showcase.title: Showcase
/notes/showcase.content:
Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens :)

- [Quartz Documentation (this site!)](https://quartz.jzhao.xyz/)
- [Strengthening Online Social Bonds: Research Garden](https://communities.digital/)
- [Jacky Zhao's Garden](https://garden.jzhao.xyz/)
- [Anson Yu's Garden](http://garden.ansonyu.me/)
- [Shihyu's PKM](https://shihyuho.github.io/pkm/)
- [Chloe's Garden](https://garden.chloeabrasada.online/)
- [SlRvb's Site](https://slrvb.github.io/Site/)
- [Course notes for Information Technology Advanced Theory](https://a2itnotes.github.io/quartz/)
- [Brandon Boswell's Garden](https://brandonkboswell.com)

If you want to see your own on here, submit a [Pull Request adding yourself to this file](https://github.com/jackyzha0/quartz/blob/hugo/content/moc/showcase.md)!
